about.title: Crafting our story, one chapter at a time, since 2024
about.description: Sri Lanka is a hidden treasure in the Indian Ocean, rich in its remarkable creations of mother nature and diverse cultures. We promote Sri Lanka on the global tourism platform not only as a typical beach vacation destination but also through its still undiscovered aspects such as culture, nature and wellness.
about.impact_description: Our vision is to create a better Sri Lanka, and we choose to do so by embracing tourism. Sri Lanka is like our mother, and everything we offer to our customers is deeply connected to the well-being of our beloved country. When you understand this, we believe there's no room for doubt about the quality and impact of what we provide. Your experience with us is an experience that helps nurture and uplift Sri Lanka itself.

hero.title: About Ceylon Wanderer
hero.subtitle: Your trusted bridge between Germany and the pearl of the Indian Ocean

unique.title: Why We Are Unique?
unique.subtitle: Discover what sets Ceylon Wanderer apart in creating exceptional travel experiences between Germany and Sri Lanka.

bridge.title: A Bridge Between Two Worlds
bridge.description: Born from a personal journey of cultural connection, our platform uniquely bridges the gap between Germany and Sri Lanka. With first-hand experience living in Germany and a deep-rooted love for Sri Lanka, we understand the expectations of German travelers and can tailor unforgettable experiences that respect both cultures.

authentic.title: Authentic and Personalized Experiences
authentic.description: Unlike mass-market travel agencies, we offer deeply curated, authentic Sri Lankan travel experiences—hosted by locals and designed with cultural sensitivity and insider knowledge. Our tours go beyond typical tourist routes, giving guests a chance to truly connect with Sri Lanka's people, nature, food, and heritage.

expertise.title: Local Expertise, International Standards
expertise.description: Our operations in Sri Lanka are handled by trusted family members and professionals who know the country inside out. This ensures travelers experience genuine hospitality while enjoying well-organized, safe, and comfortable journeys that meet high international standards.

purpose.title: Driven by Purpose, Not Just Profit
purpose.description: This business is rooted in love—love for Sri Lanka and a desire to contribute to its positive development. A portion of our profits will go toward sustainable local initiatives, supporting communities and preserving the beauty that makes Sri Lanka so special.

german.title: Tailored for the German Traveler
german.description: Having trained as a tourism assistant manager in Germany, we understand what German tourists value most—efficiency, reliability, safety, and meaningful travel. Every aspect of our service is designed to meet these expectations, with German-language support, clear communication, and thoughtful itinerary planning.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Sri Lanka?
cta.description: Let us create a personalized journey that connects you with the authentic heart of Sri Lanka.

hero.description: Where every moment becomes an unforgettable memory.

destination.description: Discover the wonders of Sri Lanka with our curated list of top destinations. From pristine beaches to ancient temples, embark on an unforgettable journey through this tropical paradise.

sustainability.description: Join us on our effort to create positive impact in volunteer and eco-tourism across Sri Lanka. Together we can make a difference and create new possibilities for all races.

education.title: Education
education.description: Empowering communities through knowledge and learning opportunities.

plant.title: Plant a Tree
plant.description: Contributing to reforestation and environmental conservation.

animal.title: Rescue Animals
animal.description: Protecting and caring for wildlife in need

content.main_title: Discover the Magic of Sri Lanka

beaches.title: Sun-Soaked Beaches
beaches.description: Experience pristine coastlines and golden sands perfect for relaxation and water sports.

landscapes.title: Diverse Landscapes
landscapes.description: Explore lush rainforests, stunning mountain ranges, and serene lakes all in one island.

culinary.title: Culinary Journey
culinary.description: Embark on a gastronomic adventure with Sri Lanka's rich and diverse cuisine.

wellness.title: Wellness & Ayurveda
wellness.description: Rejuvenate your body and mind with traditional Ayurvedic treatments and yoga retreats.

content.description: Whether you want to spend a typical beach or wellness vacation, explore nature and seek adventure, or experience the vibrant Sri Lankan culture, we will arrange a tailor-made itinerary for you in our country.
content.closing_text: Sri Lanka offers a perfect blend of diverse experiences - all in one captivating island.

district_map.title: Explore Sri Lanka
district_map.subtitle: Discover the unique charm and beauty of each district

districts.colombo: The commercial capital and largest city of Sri Lanka.
districts.gampaha: An urban district adjacent to Colombo, known for its industrial and economic importance.
districts.kalutara: A coastal district famous for its beaches, rubber plantations, and the Kalutara Bodhiya.
districts.kandy: The cultural capital of Sri Lanka, home to the sacred Temple of the Tooth Relic.
districts.matale: A spice-growing region in the central highlands with historic sites like Aluvihare Rock Temple.
districts.nuwaraeliya: The 'Little England' of Sri Lanka, famous for tea estates and cool climate.
districts.galle: A coastal city famous for the Galle Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
districts.matara: A coastal district with colonial-era architecture and scenic beaches.
districts.hambantota: A rapidly developing district with a modern port and national parks.
districts.jaffna: The cultural heart of Sri Lankan Tamils, known for its temples and historical sites.
districts.vanni: A gateway to the Northern Province with a mix of cultures and agricultural importance.
districts.batticaloa: A coastal district with beautiful lagoons and a rich Tamil cultural heritage.
districts.digamadulla: A district with a mix of agriculture, wildlife, and historic Buddhist sites.
districts.trincomalee: A natural harbor city with stunning beaches and historical significance.
districts.kurunegala: A historical district with ancient rock temples and a strong agricultural base.
districts.puttalam: A district known for salt production, fishing, and the Wilpattu National Park.
districts.anuradhapura: The ancient capital known for its well-preserved ruins of Sri Lankan civilization.
districts.polonnaruwa: The medieval capital of Sri Lanka with well-preserved ancient ruins.
districts.badulla: A picturesque district in the central highlands, famous for tea plantations and waterfalls.
districts.monaragala: A rural district known for its natural beauty, mountains, and wildlife.
districts.ratnapura: The gem capital of Sri Lanka, rich in natural beauty and waterfalls.
districts.kegalle: A district with lush greenery, famous for rubber plantations and the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage.
